keywords.value: Is That a Gun in Your Pocket?... (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: “Is That a Gun in Your Pocket?...” is a clumsy comedy that transports the premise of “Lysistrata” to small-town Texas, with a twist.

headline.main: Review: A Sex-or-Guns Comedy That Might Make Aristophanes Wince
